channel.title: 562 changing PkPoints count each kills?

item.title: 562 changing PkPoints count each kills?
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Hi, i got a 562, atomic scape base and i cant find how to change pkpoints count each kills. Theres the code in deathevent.java

[code=java] } else if (entity instanceof Player) {
Player player = (Player) entity;
if (player.getKiller() != null) {
Player p2 = (Player) player.getKiller();
p2.KC++;
p2.PkPoints++;
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You Have Defeated “+player.getUsername()+”.”);
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage("You Downed "+player.getUsername()+ " You Have Now “+p2.PkPoints+ " Shops Points”);
player.getWalkingQueue().reset();
player.PvPDrop(p2);

        }[/code]

Thank You!

Read full topic
